state: Welcome to TextWorld! First step, open the hatch within the bedchamber. After pulling open the hatch, try to take a trip south. With that done, go west. Then, try to travel south. Once you finish that, go to the west. With that done, take a trip north. With that accomplished, make an attempt to go west. Then, take a trip north. And then, take a trip north. And then, try to head east. And then, move south. With that accomplished, venture east. After that, travel north. Then, pick up the shirt from the floor of the pantry. Got that? Good! -= Bedchamber =- You find yourself in a bedchamber. An usual kind of place. Let's see what's in here. A closed dresser is in the corner. There is a closed hatch leading south. There is an open gateway leading north. > -= Bedchamber =-0/1

next_state: -= Sauna =- You find yourself in a sauna. You make out a bench. But the thing is empty, unfortunately. There is an open hatch leading north. There is an open passageway leading west. > -= Sauna =-0/3
